titles.title: Sǝnkǝssar “Synaxarion” (the second half of the year)

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Sǝnkǝssar “Synaxarion” for the second half of the year (fols. 7ra-178rc) I-1) Mäggabit (fols. 7ra-35vc) I-2) Miyazya (fols. 36ra-57rc) I-3) Gǝnbot (fols. 57va-83rb) I-4) Säne (fols. 84ra-109vc) I-5) Ḥamle (fols. 110ra-148rc) I-6) Näḥase” (fols. 148va – 173rc) I-7) Ṗagwǝmen (fols. 173va – 178rc) The commemorative notices are followed by a ʿarke-hymns
Additio 1.

donors.donor: Wäldä ʾArägawi is the name inserted in some supplication formulas at the end of the commemoration entries (or elsewhere filling the lines) by a different hand, in reddish-brown ink (s. fols. 35ra, l.22; 35vc, l.33; 36vb, l.35; 36vb, l.35; 57rb, l.10; 105rb, l.5; 177vb, l.6). Wäldä ʾArägawi is so far unidentified; his relation to däğğač Kaśa of Additio 1 is unclear (possibly, it is Kaśa's baptismal name).

owners.owner: däğğač Kaśa Sǝbḥat, according to Additio 1.

dcomments.dcomment: Late 19th - first half of the 20th cent. Additio 1 mentions däğğač Kaśa, a son of ras Sǝbḥat ʾArägawi. Däğğač Kaśa was the governor of ʿAgamä in 1914-1918 and 1941-1948. Cp. Hagos Gäbrä Yoḥannǝs, “Political History of Tigray: Rivalry for power (1910-1935), PhD thesis, Addis Abäba University, 2003, 46.

txstates.txstate: The leather of the spine is damaged (to the most part torn off). The threads of the binding are partly broken. Some quires and some folios are separated from the binding. Many folios have stains (e.g., s. fols.: 1rv, 61rv, 66rv, 70r, 73rv, 87r, 103r, 104r, 143v, 144rv, 145r) and cuts carefully amended (e.g., s.: fols. 2, 3, 4, 21, 36, 38, 42, 48, 53, 80, 173).

bindings.binding: Wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

txfolios.txfolio: After fol. 109vb, where the text remains incomplete, one or more folios are probably missing.

squires.squire: A (6/fols. 1r - 6v) – ፩I(8/fols. 7r - 14v) – ፪II(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 15r - 22v) – ፫III(8/fols. 23r - 30v) – ፬IV(5; s.l.: 4, stub after 1/fols. 31r - 35v) – ፭V(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 36r - 43v) – ፮VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 44r - 51v) – ፯VII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 52r - 59v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 60r - 67v) – ፱IX (8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 68r - 75v) – ፲X(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 76r - 83v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 84r – 91v) – ፲፪XII(10/fols. 92r – 101v) – ፲፫XIII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 102r – 109v) – ፲፬XIV(9; s.l.: 8, stub after 1/fols. 110r – 118v) – ፲፭XV(8/fols. 119r – 126v) – ፲፮XVI(8/fols. 127r – 134v) – ፲፯XVII(8; s.l.: 5, stub after 5/fols. 135r – 142v) – ፲፰XVIII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 143r – 150v) – ፲፱XIX(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 151r-158v) – ፳XX(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 159r-166v) – ፳፩XXI(8/fols. 167r-174v) – ፳፪XXII(7; s.l.: 6, stub after 1/fols. 175r-181v).

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Late 19th - first half of the 20th century

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: fine and regular. Hand b: mediocre.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 7ra–75vc; 84ra–92va; 110rabc; 145rb–169rc. Hand b: fols. 76ra–83rb; 92vb–109vc; 111va–145ra; 169va–178rc.

additional.cont: Fol. 178rb, ls. 13-14: Ownership note.
additional.tran: Fol. 178rb, l.13: This is the book of däğğač Kaśa, the name of his father is Sǝbḥat.
